verses.text_uthmani: يسٓ

translations.text: Yâ-Sĩn.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya-seen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ

translations.text: By the Quran, rich in wisdom!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walqur-ani alhakeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.text: You ˹O Prophet˺ are truly one of the messengers
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innaka lamina almursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

translations.text: upon the Straight Path.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAala siratin mustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

translations.text: ˹This is˺ a revelation from the Almighty, Most Merciful,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tanzeela alAAazeezi arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ

translations.text: so that you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, and so are heedless.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Litunthira qawman ma onthiraabaohum fahum ghafiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: The decree ˹of torment˺ has already been justified against most of them, for they will never believe.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad haqqa alqawlu AAalaaktharihim fahum la yu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ

translations.text: ˹It is as if˺ We have put shackles around their necks up to their chins, so their heads are forced up,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna jaAAalna fee aAAnaqihimaghlalan fahiya ila al-athqani fahummuqmahoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ

translations.text: and have placed a barrier before them and a barrier behind them and covered them ˹all˺ up, so they fail to see ˹the truth˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalna min bayni aydeehim saddanwamin khalfihim saddan faaghshaynahum fahum la yubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: It is the same whether you warn them or not—they will never believe.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wasawaon AAalayhim aanthartahumam lam tunthirhum la yu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ

translations.text: You can only warn those who follow the Reminder<sup foot_note=77229>1</sup> and are in awe of the Most Compassionate without seeing Him.<sup foot_note=77230>2</sup> So give them good news of forgiveness and an honourable reward.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innama tunthiru mani ittabaAAaaththikra wakhashiya arrahmanabilghaybi fabashshirhu bimaghfiratin waajrin kareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: It is certainly We Who resurrect the dead, and write what they send forth and what they leave behind. Everything is listed by Us in a perfect Record.<sup foot_note=77231>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna nahnu nuhyeealmawta wanaktubu ma qaddamoo waatharahumwakulla shay-in ahsaynahu fee imamin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.text: Give them an example ˹O Prophet˺ of the residents of a town, when the messengers came to them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wadrib lahum mathalan as-habaalqaryati ith jaaha almursaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ

translation.text: but they denied both of them

translations.text: We sent them two messengers, but they rejected both. So We reinforced ˹the two˺ with a third, and they declared, “We have indeed been sent to you ˹as messengers˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith arsalna ilayhimu ithnaynifakaththaboohuma faAAazzazna bithalithinfaqaloo inna ilaykum mursaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ

translations.text: The people replied, “You are only humans like us, and the Most Compassionate has not revealed anything. You are simply lying!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ma antum illabasharun mithluna wama anzala arrahmanumin shay-in in antum illa takthiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.text: The messengers responded, “Our Lord knows that we have truly been sent to you.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo rabbuna yaAAlamu innailaykum lamursaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

translations.text: And our duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama AAalayna illaalbalaghu almubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

translations.text: The people replied, “We definitely see you as a bad omen for us. If you do not desist, we will certainly stone you ˹to death˺ and you will be touched with a painful punishment from us.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo inna tatayyarnabikum la-in lam tantahoo lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minnaAAathabun aleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ

translations.text: The messengers said, “Your bad omen lies within yourselves. Are you saying this because you are reminded ˹of the truth˺? In fact, you are a transgressing people.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ta-irukum maAAakum a-in thukkirtumbal antum qawmun musrifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

translations.text: Then from the farthest end of the city a man came, rushing. He advised, “O my people! Follow the messengers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajaa min aqsa almadeenatirajulun yasAAa qala ya qawmi ittabiAAooalmursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: Follow those who ask no reward of you, and are ˹rightly˺ guided.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: IttabiAAoo man la yas-alukum ajranwahum muhtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

translations.text: And why should I not worship the One Who has originated me, and to Whom you will be returned.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama liya la aAAbudu allatheefataranee wa-ilayhi turjaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ

translations.text: How could I take besides Him other gods whose intercession would not be of any benefit to me, nor could they save me if the Most Compassionate intended to harm me?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aattakhithu min doonihi alihatanin yuridni arrahmanu bidurrin la tughniAAannee shafaAAatuhum shay-an wala yunqithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: Indeed, I would then be clearly astray.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innee ithan lafee dalalinmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ

translations.text: I do believe in your Lord, so listen to me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innee amantu birabbikum fasmaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: ˹But they killed him, then˺ he was told ˹by the angels˺, “Enter Paradise!” He said, “If only my people knew
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qeela odkhuli aljannata qala yalayta qawmee yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ

translations.text: of how my Lord has forgiven me, and made me one of the honourable.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bima ghafara lee rabbee wajaAAalaneemina almukrameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ

translations.text: We did not send any soldiers from the heavens against his people after his death, nor did We need to.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama anzalna AAalaqawmihi min baAAdihi min jundin mina assama-i wamakunna munzileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَـٰمِدُونَ

translations.text: All it took was one ˹mighty˺ blast, and they were extinguished at once.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In kanat illa sayhatanwahidatan fa-itha hum khamidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translations.text: Oh pity, such beings! No messenger ever came to them without being mocked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya hasratan AAalaalAAibadi ma ya/teehim min rasoolin illa kanoobihi yastahzi-oon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.text: Have the deniers not considered how many peoples We destroyed before them who never came back to life again?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam yaraw kam ahlakna qablahum minaalqurooni annahum ilayhim la yarjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ

translations.text: Yet they will all be brought before Us.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in kullun lamma jameeAAun ladaynamuhdaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَـٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ

translations.text: There is a sign for them in the dead earth: We give it life, producing grain from it for them to eat.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waayatun lahumu al-ardualmaytatu ahyaynaha waakhrajna minhahabban faminhu ya/kuloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ

translation.text: and We caused to gush forth

translations.text: And We have placed in it gardens of palm trees and grapevines, and caused springs to gush forth in it,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalna feeha jannatinmin nakheelin waaAAnabin wafajjarna feehamina alAAuyoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ

translations.text: so that they may eat from its fruit, which they had no hand in making. Will they not then give thanks?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Liya/kuloo min thamarihi wamaAAamilat-hu aydeehim afala yashkuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: Glory be to the One Who created all ˹things in˺ pairs—˹be it˺ what the earth produces, their genders, or what they do not know!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Subhana allathee khalaqaal-azwaja kullaha mimma tunbitu al-arduwamin anfusihim wamimma la yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ

translations.text: There is also a sign for them in the night: We strip from it daylight, then—behold!—they are in darkness.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waayatun lahumu allaylu naslakhuminhu annahara fa-itha hum muthlimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ

translations.text: The sun travels for its fixed term. That is the design of the Almighty, All-Knowing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Washshamsu tajree limustaqarrin lahathalika taqdeeru alAAazeezi alAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَـٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ

translations.text: As for the moon, We have ordained ˹precise˺ phases for it, until it ends up ˹looking˺ like an old, curved palm stalk.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walqamara qaddarnahu manazilahatta AAada kalAAurjooni alqadeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ

translations.text: It is not for the sun to catch up with the moon,<sup foot_note=77232>1</sup> nor does the night outrun the day. Each is travelling in an orbit of their own.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La ashshamsu yanbaghee lahaan tudrika alqamara wala allaylu sabiqu annahariwakullun fee falakin yasbahoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ

translations.text: Another sign for them is that We carried their ancestors ˹with Noah˺ in the fully loaded Ark,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waayatun lahum anna hamalnathurriyyatahum fee alfulki almashhoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ

translations.text: and created for them similar things to ride in.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakhalaqna lahum min mithlihi mayarkaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ

translation.text: (would be) a responder to a cry

translations.text: If We willed, We could drown them: then no one would respond to their cries, nor would they be rescued—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in nasha/ nughriqhum fala sareekhalahum wala hum yunqathoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ

translations.text: except by mercy from Us, allowing them enjoyment for a ˹little˺ while.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa rahmatan minnawamataAAan ila heen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

translations.text: ˹Still they turn away˺ when it is said to them, “Beware of what is ahead of you ˹in the Hereafter˺ and what is behind you ˹of destroyed nations˺ so you may be shown mercy.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha qeela lahumu ittaqoo mabayna aydeekum wama khalfakum laAAallakum turhamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ

translations.text: Whenever a sign comes to them from their Lord, they turn away from it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama ta/teehim min ayatin min ayatirabbihim illa kanoo AAanha muAArideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: And when it is said to them, “Donate from what Allah has provided for you,” the disbelievers say to the believers, “Why should we feed those whom Allah could have fed if He wanted to? You are clearly astray!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha qeela lahum anfiqoo mimmarazaqakumu Allahu qala allatheena kafaroolillatheena amanoo anutAAimu man law yashaoAllahu atAAamahu in antum illa fee dalalinmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: And they ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayaqooloona mata hathaalwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ

translations.text: They must be awaiting a single Blast,<sup foot_note=77233>1</sup> which will seize them while they are ˹entrenched˺ in ˹worldly˺ disputes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma yanthuroona illasayhatan wahidatan ta/khuthuhum wahumyakhissimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.text: Then they will not be able to make a ˹last˺ will, nor can they return to their own people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala yastateeAAoona tawsiyatanwala ila ahlihim yarjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ

translations.text: The Trumpet will be blown ˹a second time˺, then—behold!—they will rush from the graves to their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanufikha fee assoori fa-ithahum mina al-ajdathi ila rabbihim yansiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.text: They will cry, “Woe to us! Who has raised us up from our place of rest? This must be what the Most Compassionate warned us of; the messengers told the truth!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ya waylana manbaAAathana min marqadina hatha mawaAAada arrahmanu wasadaqaalmursaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ

translations.text: It will only take one Blast, then at once they will all be brought before Us.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In kanat illa sayhatanwahidatan fa-itha hum jameeAAun ladayna muhdaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: On that Day no soul will be wronged in the least, nor will you be rewarded except for what you used to do.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falyawma la tuthlamunafsun shay-an wala tujzawna illa ma kuntumtaAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, on that Day the residents of Paradise will be busy enjoying themselves.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna as-haba aljannati alyawmafee shughulin fakihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ

translations.text: They and their spouses will be in ˹cool˺ shade, reclining on ˹canopied˺ couches.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hum waazwajuhum fee thilalinAAala al-ara-iki muttaki-oon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

translations.text: There they will have fruits and whatever they desire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lahum feeha fakihatun walahumma yaddaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ

translations.text: And “Peace!” will be ˹their˺ greeting from the Merciful Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Salamun qawlan min rabbin raheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

translations.text: ˹Then the disbelievers will be told,˺ “Step away ˹from the believers˺ this Day, O  wicked ones!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamtazoo alyawma ayyuhaalmujrimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: Did I not command you, O  Children of Adam, not to follow Satan, for he is truly your sworn enemy,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam aAAhad ilaykum ya banee adamaan la taAAbudoo ashshaytana innahu lakumAAaduwwun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ

translations.text: but to worship Me ˹alone˺? This is the Straight Path.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waani oAAbudoonee hatha siratunmustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ

translations.text: Yet he already misled great multitudes of you. Did you not have any sense?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad adalla minkum jibillankatheeran afalam takoonoo taAAqiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: This is the Hell you were warned of.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hathihi jahannamu allatee kuntumtooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ

translations.text: Burn in it Today for your disbelief.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Islawha alyawma bimakuntum takfuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

translations.text: On this Day We will seal their mouths, their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify to what they used to commit.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alyawma nakhtimu AAala afwahihimwatukallimuna aydeehim watashhadu arjuluhum bima kanooyaksiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ

translations.text: Had We willed, We could have easily blinded their eyes, so they would struggle to find their way. How then could they see?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw nashao latamasnaAAala aAAyunihim fastabaqoo assiratafaanna yubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.text: And had We willed, We could have transfigured them on the spot,<sup foot_note=77234>1</sup> so they could neither progress forward nor turn back.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw nashao lamasakhnahumAAala makanatihim fama istataAAoo mudiyyanwala yarjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ

translations.text: And whoever We grant a long life, We reverse them in development.<sup foot_note=77235>1</sup> Will they not then understand?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman nuAAammirhu nunakkis-hu fee alkhalqiafala yaAAqiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: We have not taught him poetry, nor is it fitting for him. This ˹Book˺ is only a Reminder and a clear Quran
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama AAallamnahu ashshiAArawama yanbaghee lahu in huwa illa thikrunwaqur-anun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ

translations.text: to warn whoever is ˹truly˺ alive and fulfil the decree ˹of torment˺ against the disbelievers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Liyunthira man kana hayyanwayahiqqa alqawlu AAala alkafireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ

translations.text: Do they not see that We singlehandedly<sup foot_note=77236>1</sup> created for them, among other things, cattle which are under their control?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa lam yaraw anna khalaqnalahum mimma AAamilat aydeena anAAaman fahumlaha malikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ

translations.text: And We have subjected these ˹animals˺ to them, so they may ride some and eat others.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathallalnaha lahumfaminha rakoobuhum waminha ya/kuloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ

translations.text: And they derive from them other benefits and drinks. Will they not then give thanks?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walahum feeha manafiAAu wamasharibuafala yashkuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ

translations.text: Still they have taken other gods besides Allah, hoping to be helped ˹by them˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wattakhathoo min dooni Allahialihatan laAAallahum yunsaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ

translations.text: They cannot help the pagans, even though they serve the idols as dedicated guards.<sup foot_note=77237>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yastateeAAoona nasrahumwahum lahum jundun muhdaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ

translations.text: So do not let their words grieve you ˹O Prophet˺. Indeed, We ˹fully˺ know what they conceal and what they reveal.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala yahzunka qawluhum innanaAAlamu ma yusirroona wama yuAAlinoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: Do people not see that We have created them from a sperm-drop, then—behold!—they openly challenge ˹Us˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa lam yara al-insanu annakhalaqnahu min nutfatin fa-itha huwa khaseemunmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ

translations.text: And they argue with Us—forgetting they were created—saying, “Who will give life to decayed bones?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wadaraba lana mathalanwanasiya khalqahu qala man yuhyee alAAithamawahiya rameem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “They will be revived by the One Who produced them the first time, for He has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of every created being.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul yuhyeeha allatheeanshaaha awwala marratin wahuwa bikulli khalqin AAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ

translations.text: ˹He is the One˺ Who gives you fire from green trees, and—behold!—you kindle ˹fire˺ from them.<sup foot_note=77238>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee jaAAala lakum mina ashshajarial-akhdari naran fa-itha antum minhutooqidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.text: Can the One Who created the heavens and the earth not ˹easily˺ resurrect these ˹deniers˺?” Yes ˹He can˺! For He is the Master Creator, All-Knowing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa laysa allathee khalaqa assamawatiwal-arda biqadirin AAala an yakhluqamithlahum bala wahuwa alkhallaqu alAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

translations.text: All it takes, when He wills something ˹to be˺, is simply to say to it: “Be!” And it is!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innama amruhu itha aradashay-an an yaqoola lahu kun fayakoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

translations.text: So glory be to the One in Whose Hands is the authority over all things, and to Whom ˹alone˺ you will ˹all˺ be returned.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasubhana allathee biyadihimalakootu kulli shay-in wa-ilayhi turjaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
